mapper.select: SELECT notice_title, notice_content, notice_reg_date, m.name AS member_name FROM notice AS n LEFT JOIN member AS m ON n.member_idx=m.member_idx WHERE notice_type = 't' AND n.member_idx = ${M_Idx}
SELECT m.name, t.subject, m.teacher_intro FROM teacher AS t INNER JOIN member AS m ON t.member_idx=m.member_idx
